latex module¶

LaTeX output functions for FileType.LATEX Manager.stream.

latex.latex_chaining(nnodes)¶

Generates a LaTeX tabular showing the binding chains between N-nodes and their associated E-nodes.

Parameters

nnodes (list[Node]) – List of N-nodes to display chains for

Return type

None

latex.latex_chaining_write(rows)¶

Generate LaTeX Chaining tabular showing chains from rows of data.

Parameters

rows (list[list[str]]) – List of rows, each representing features of a node.

Return type

None

latex.latex_features(nodes, title='Features')¶

Generates a LaTeX tabular displaying the feature matrix (PNF, FPF, etc.) for each node in the syntax tree. The output is split into chunks of 40 data rows each (plus header row) to improve LaTeX processing.

Parameters

  • nodes (list[Node]) – List of nodes to display features for

  • title (str, optional) – Title for the feature matrix. Defaults to “Features”.

Return type

None

latex.latex_features_rows(rows, title='Features')¶
Parameters

  • rows (list[list[str]]) –

  • title (str) –

Return type

None

latex.latex_features_write(rows, title)¶

Generate LaTeX tabular showing features from rows of data.

Parameters

  • rows (list[list[str]]) – List of rows, each representing features of a node.

  • title (str) –

Return type

None

latex.latex_interpretations(interps)¶

Generates a LaTeX tabular displaying all valid pronoun binding interpretations found for the sentence.

Parameters

interps (list[list[list[Node]]]) – List of valid interpretations to display

Return type

None

latex.latex_interpretations_write(rows)¶

Generate LaTeX Interpretations tabular showing rows.

Parameters

rows (list[str]) – List of rows, each row representing an interpretation.

Return type

None

latex.latex_lexicon()¶

Generates a LaTeX tabular displaying the feature matrix (PNF, FPF, etc.) for each entry in lexicon_dict.

Return type

None

latex.latex_nodes(nodes)¶

Generates a LaTeX tabular displaying all nodes in the syntax tree with their identifiers and properties.

Parameters

nodes (list[Node]) – List of nodes to display

Return type

None

latex.latex_nodes_write(rows)¶

Generates LaTeX source code from the provided rows of node data.

Parameters

rows (list[str]) – List of rows, each a list of two strings.

Return type

None

latex.latex_summary()¶

Generates a LaTeX table displaying demo Summary.

Return type

None

latex.latex_summary_write(rows)¶

Generate LaTeX Summary tabular showing rows.

Parameters

rows (list[str]) – List of rows, each row presenting a demo statistic.

Return type

None
